title: New: Death Rattle – The Dig
body:
**Death Rattle** is such an awesome name for a band.

Defined as _‘a medical term that describes the sound produced by someone who is near death when saliva accumulates in the throat’_ it brings about dark, fairly violent connotations, and certainly bodes well for the music, in my mind. London duo **Helen** and **Chris Hamilton** (ex-**That Mouth**) are currently recording under this slightly macabre title, and have just released their debut track, _The Dig_. A dirty, behemoth of a first outing, it’s percussion heavy, yet fairly sparse, relying heavily on the immaculate production of the track. Check out the twisted video for _The Dig_ below, and head over to the **Death Rattle** [bandcamp](http://deathrattle.bandcamp.com/) for a free download.
